meanings.definition: Smoothed out or straightened from being crumpled.
meanings.sent1: The uncrumpled paper looked neat and tidy on the desk.
meanings.sent2: She carefully uncrumpled the wrinkled shirt before wearing it.
meanings.sent3: The uncrumpled map led them safely to their destination.
meanings.sent4: His uncrumpled smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The uncrumpled flag fluttered proudly in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The uncrumpled bedsheet felt smooth against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The uncrumpled letter was ready to be sent in the mail.
meanings.sent3: The uncrumpled napkin stayed pristine throughout the meal.
meanings.sent4: Her uncrumpled hair shone in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The uncrumpled dress hung elegantly on the hanger.
